      Classes in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.controllers that implement ControlListener

      class  MultiList
      A Multilist is a multi-menu-tree controller. see the example for more information and how to use.

    • Uses of ControlListener in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.group

      Classes in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.group that implement ControlListener 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Accordion
      The Accordion is a list of ControlGroups which can be expanded and collapsed.
      class  CheckBox
      A multiple-choice radioButton. items are added to a checkBox and can be organized in rows and columns. items of a checkBox are of type Toggle.
      class  ColorPicker
      A simple color picker using sliders to adjust RGBA values.
      class  ControlGroup<T>
      In previous versions you would use the ControlGroup class to bundle controllers in a group.
      class  ControllerGroup<T>
      ControllerGroup is an abstract class and is extended by class ControlGroup, Tab, or the ListBox.
      class  DropdownList 
      class  Group 
      class  ListBox
      A ListBox is a list of vertically aligned items which can be scrolled if required.
      class  Radio 
      class  RadioButton
      A radioButton is a list of toggles that can be turned on or off. radioButton is of type ControllerGroup, therefore a controllerPlug can't be set. this means that an event from a radioButton can't be forwarded to a method other than controlEvent in a sketch.
      class  Tab
      Tabs are used to organize controllers.
      class  Textarea
      a textarea can be used to leave notes, it uses the skatolo BitFont to render text.

      adds a listener to the controller.
      T ControllerGroup.removeListener(ControlListener theListener)
